item.title: U.S. Official: Trump in Good Health, About to Go Play Golf
item.description: On August 30th, Barak Ravid, a reporter from Axios Global Affairs, wrote that a U.S. official stated that President Trump is in a good physical state and will go play golf this morning in the local time. At the moment when this news was released, widespread speculation about Trump's health was still circulating on social media.

item.title: The White Whale Trader's long position is currently down over $13 million.
item.description: August 30th. Based on on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the positions of trader The White Whale in five addresses currently have a total unrealized loss of more than 13.37 million USD. One of the addresses is experiencing a loss of 13.31 million USD from long positions in BTC and ETH. Nevertheless, the collateral in this address is as high as 52.25 million USD, and the current collateral utilization rate is only 10%.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Quack AI (Q) and open airdrop claims to eligible users
item.description: On August 30th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list Quack AI (Q) on September 2nd.Alpha Trading Opening Time: 15:00 (UTC+8) on September 2, 2025.Contract Trading Opening Time: 15:30 (UTC+8) on September 2, 2025.Qualified users will be able to participate in the Alpha event and receive an airdrop by using Binance Alpha points once the Alpha trading commences. Specific details will be disclosed separately.

item.title: This week, the United States Ethereum Spot ETF recorded a total net inflow of $10.829 billion.
item.description: On August 30th, as per the monitoring data from Farside, this week the US Ethereum spot ETF witnessed a cumulative net inflow of $10.829 billion.

item.title: The high-profile ETH whale has once again transferred 2120 BTC to HyperUnit for swapping ETH.
item.description: On August 30th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, the highly visible BTC whale that swapped a significant amount of ETH has once again deposited 2120 BTC (valued at $230 million) into HyperUnit for the exchange of ETH, and 1120 BTC is currently still unsold.

item.title: Hyperscale Data is planning to sell common stock to raise $125 million to purchase BTC and XRP
item.description: On August 30th, as per PR Newswire, the U.S. listed company Hyperscale Data (NYSE: GPUS) declared that it had set up a "market issuance" equity issuance plan. The company may from time to time sell its common stock in order to raise a total of up to 125 million U.S. dollars. A portion of the proceeds from this fundraising will be utilized to purchase Bitcoin and expand its Michigan data facility. Another part will be used to purchase XRP. The rest will be allocated for working capital and general corporate purposes, which may include repaying, refinancing, redeeming, or repurchasing future debt or equity.

item.title: WLFI: Protocol governance power will be fully controlled by a multisig during security risks or major adverse events
item.description: August 30th. As per the official website, World Liberty Financial (referred to as the WLF Protocol) declared in a governance statement that the WLF Protocol or any associated protocols might encounter "significant adverse events," meaning any event that obstructs the intended and prolonged normal operation of the WLF Protocol or any related protocols. Or it might encounter "security risks," referring to any event that leads to the cessation of the WLF Protocol's operation or endangers the security of users utilizing the WLF Protocol.During a period of significant adverse events or security risks, the governance control of the WLF Protocol will be solely in the hands of a multi-signature until the normal governance operations of the WLF Protocol can be restored.Previously reported, the unlocking of the WLFI token is scheduled to officially start at 8:00 AM EST on September 1st, and the relevant functionality page is now available.

item.title: El Salvador will distribute its Bitcoin reserve among 14 wallet holders to mitigate potential quantum computing threats
item.description: On August 30th, as per Cointelegraph, El Salvador has redistributed its Bitcoin reserve to 14 new wallet addresses in order to address potential quantum computing threats.The El Salvador Bitcoin Office indicated that by dividing the funds into smaller quantities, the potential impact of a quantum attack can be reduced. Each Bitcoin address can hold a maximum of 500 bitcoins.

item.title: Next Week Macro Outlook: The Fed to Release Beige Book, August Non-Farm Payrolls on the Horizon
item.description: August 30th. During this week, the cryptocurrency market witnessed a notable sell-off. However, this occurred following a solid performance in the previous week. Owing to the reduction in volatility and the upcoming release of key data next week, some relatively weak highs have taken shape. Bitcoin is at risk of a double top and has failed to offer significant defense against its impact. Meanwhile, Ethereum retraced further after reaching a new high last Saturday. Here are the key points that the market will focus on in the new week (all times are Beijing time):Wednesday 21:00, 2025 FOMC Voter, St. Louis Fed President Muli Saleem will deliver a speech on the U.S. economy and monetary policy;Thursday 01:30, 2026 FOMC Voter, Minneapolis Fed President Kashkari participates in a fireside chat;Thursday 02:00, The Fed releases the Beige Book on economic conditions;Thursday 23:30, FOMC Permanent Voter, New York Fed President Williams speaks at the New York Economics Club;Friday 07:0

item.title: Wuhan Police in China Bust Virtual Currency Investment Blind Date Fraud Case, Arrest 30 Suspects
item.description: August 30th. According to reports from Huanqiu.com, the Dongxihu Sub-bureau of the Wuhan Public Security Bureau in Hubei Province has taken action against a group that was posing as a tech company to engage in telecom fraud. The individuals involved in this case created a "high-quality blind date female" scenario to befriend others and lured netizens to a fake cryptocurrency investment platform. The police on the scene arrested 30 criminal suspects and seized more than 40 work computers used for fraud, over 50 work phones, more than 100 scripts, packaging materials for personas, and photos.The suspects would send a fake investment website to the victims after winning their trust and entice them to purchase cryptocurrency and invest in the fake platform. The scammers had full control over the profits, but the "withdrawal" process always failed. Currently, 27 individuals involved have been placed under criminal detention, and 3 individuals have been administratively detained. The polic
